item.description:
Hi Guys,

Anyone up for a climb Friday? If there is interest we can grab a bite afterwards. There are a few places in the strip mall where we went last week.

Please note you will need to pass a belay tested if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can also take a class if you have never climbed before. They have a shuttle to the gym from the Wellington T Station if you don't have a car. Look up Metro Rock's web site - or give them a call.

Have a great week,
Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging out at the picnic table.
item.name: I vote to climb on Friday! :o)
